title: Nightglow
summaries: The Nightglow is a Hardmode, post-Plantera magic weapon that has a 25*1/4 (25%) chance to be dropped by the Empress of Light. When fired, four rainbow-colored projectiles emerge from the player and home in on nearby enemies. Each of the projectiles can pierce enemies and hit three times, resulting in high potential damage, but loses 20% of damage for each enemy struck.
